description: Number of ternary Lyndon words whose digits sum to 0 mod 3; also number of trace 0 irreducible polynomials over GF(3).
comments: Also number of ternary Lyndon words of trace 0 over GF(3).
links: F. Ruskey, Number of q-ary Lyndon words with given trace mod q
F. Ruskey, Number of monic irreducible polynomials over GF(q) with zero trace ...
F. Ruskey, Number of Lyndon words of given trace
Index entries for sequences related to Lyndon words
mathematica: a[n_] := 1/(3n) DivisorSum[n, GCD[#, 3]*MoebiusMu[#]*3^(n/#)&]; Array[a, 32] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 06 2015, adapted from PARI *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = 1/(3*n) * sumdiv(n, d, gcd(d, 3)*moebius(d)*3^(n/d) ); /* _Joerg Arndt_, Aug 17 2012 */
author: _Frank Ruskey_, Dec 13 1999
